评论详情: Comfortable fit material is fair
this was so cute i recommend
My daughter loved this gift.

This top was surprisingly stretchy. And held up pretty good. It is crotchet, so it is a little “see through” with the material. So wear a bra or pastiest if you don’t want anything showing. Or don’t, it’s still flattering. I got this in a size medium and it felt just a little small. My friend is wearing a size XL.
Es bonito cómodo y se ajusta a tu cuerpo
Material feels good, soft and stretchy. But definitely runs too big. I wear a small and unfortunately they don’t have an XS, so I’ll have to find a different top.

This crochet halter top was perfect for summer! It’s purple and blue colors really complimented each other. I love the softness and texture of the fabric. This garment is well constructed and fits true to size.
Loved but it was a little to short
Cute but big I got a small but I wear medium and it was still to big
Soft yarn, but unsubstantial. So different looking from photo.

Clothes are only made for girls with small chests or fake perky ones now. This had absolutely nothing to it. No support anywhere. I couldn’t even wear this walking down the stairs without my boobs falling out. And way more cropped than the photos show.
It stretches out of shape and isn’t snapping back to shape when washed. Not a very sturdy top.

I bought this for my niece. She loves it and it really looks great on her. She is a DD cup size and I was worried it might not fit her very well but it did and it looks beautiful on her. She really loved the colors.
Very very stretchy. Wasn't for me. Maybe some teenager who needs less support. I returned the item. Cute tho
I should’ve ordered a small as a 34c bra size. But it’s not terrible either!!! It’s great quality
It’s shorter than I expected, so I can’t wear it. But my daughter can and it looks adorable on her.

Cute but stretched after the first wear. The top is cheaply made, so I won't be putting the top in the washing machine out of fear of it disintegrating or shrinking. The straps are not the most flattering.
Looks fantastic. Super comfy.

It's good fabric but I ordered a small when normally I'm a large do to having big knockers and tiny bust but this shirt was still to big. Also my girls are naturally pretty perky but this top made them look like they where going onto 50 also ZERO support. I suppose good shirt for the flat chested but if you've got knockers stay FARRRRR away.

I am typically a large (sometimes xl) in crop tops and honestly this was slightly too big on me. However! I do love the softness of the top and quality of the crochet-ing. This will be perfect for summer time!
It’s pretty good but you need a chest to fill it out. it’s good material but it rubs against the skin
Huge and no support. I sent it back immediately
Not very good quality. And the cream/beige looking color on the pic is actually very yellow): Not worth almost $30.

评论概述: cute but a few things to note
评论详情: I like this top, it fits well. Definitely size down!  probably need a strapless bra with this, nip pokes out just a wee bit lol

I paired mine with a medium bright over the knee skirt. Cute and flattering for the upcoming warm weather. Love the different shades of green. Love the comfort. And you can adjust the halter strap accordingly.

So I love this. I read the reviews and normally I’m an XL the yarn is so stretchy that I legit could have gotten away with a small this thing is SUPER stretchy and I’m not even going to complain it makes me good 😂 they said to size down and boy they weren’t joking but in my opinion it’s a one size fits all next time I order I’m getting a small and I love these covers!
Only complaint is that its hard to cover my bra

评论概述: How to return shirt that’s too big
评论详情: I have ordered 2 of these shirts, same shirt, a size X-Large, which is the size normally worn, it was too big so I ordered a large, exact same top, which is also too big. I have the large ready for return, and have now ordered a medium in hopes it works, but it will not give me the option to return the x large top. It was ordered with another shirt, which worked perfectly, and packaged together so I’m not sure if that’s my problem or not but I really need to return the orange/red striped X-Large shirt. Can you please help me??
Love this, so comfy, cute and soft fits perfect,  I’m 5-7, 38D, 135 lbs, highly recommend
The shirt wasn’t bad, and I knew there wouldn’t be much support, but the material felt like it would just stretch out too much and lose shape and I didn’t want to chance it. I returned it.
Wore this for a 70s themed trip and it was so cute! Comfortable and will wear again!
The material is pretty cheap, a little short, but I love the adjustments.
Top is exactly as pictured. Very soft and stretchy.
Cute quality tank top for summer.
I'm a D cup.  There's absolutely no support underneath.
this ran a little bigger than I expected. Was very cute though and good quality. Look just like the picture. Next time I would order a smaller size.
Material is very soft and stretchy so I would size down at least one to two sizes before ordering. Color is as expected.
This was so tiny! Really needed for vacation but it was too short and small!!
My favorite top!!!! Fits perfectly and the quality it really great!
Very cute love the colors perfect for the beach and a pool party
Looks cheap. Feels cheap. Fits as expected, other than an excessively long neck strap. Bright pink color is fun
i’m a 36C or 34DD & it’s super cute but i’d have to wear a bra for it to look right! if you size down they might be able to hold the girls up more but it’s still super cute & good for summer!
I liked the fit and the comfort of the material. It’s made well enough for the cost. I received lots of compliments.

评论概述: Here for a good time, not a long time
评论详情: It gives exactly what you think it gives, but it's made so poorly and with such cheap, lightweight materials that it's only gonna last a handful of wears. But I love it so and will cherish it for the short time it will be around. I wanted that nostalgic crochet halter from the early 2000s in a bright summery color, and this is everything I wanted. I've worn it three times and with very delicate handwashing, I think I may just get one more summer out of it.

评论概述: No elastic in the yarn so it doesn't hold you up
评论详情: Us ladies all know halters help to hold up 'the twins'.  I had a breast lift with augmentation so I don't need the lift, however, there is no elastic in the yarn to the part of the shirt under the boobs that goes all around you gaps open.  It doesn't cling to your shape like it should and the boobs slip out the bottom.  Very low quality
It was very stretched out when I got it. Had to send back.
This top is beautiful and high quality.  Fits like a dream and figure flattering.  Just wish it came in different colors.
